         <QueryRecipe pk={recipeId} />

body_text: If the seed value is just the recipeId, we can probably change seed to just id or something similar. The term seed was more appropriate when it was more directly responsible for the shield generation.
body: If the `seed` value is just the `recipeId`, we can probably change `seed` to just `id` or something similar. The term `seed` was more appropriate when it was more directly responsible for the shield generation.
body_html: If the seed value is just the recipeId, we can probably change seed to just id or something similar. The term seed was more appropriate when it was more directly responsible for the shield generation.
